Written in Java using SolrJ client library.
Uses Apache Solr 9.7.0 server running in cloud mode via HTTP.
Solr server started with 1GB heap memory (-m 1g).
Uses StandardAnalyzer (text_general field type in Solr).
Query and document caches disabled for fair benchmarking.
Multi-threaded indexing with batch size of 1000 documents.
HTTP/2 client for communication with Solr server.
Supports full Lucene query parser syntax via defType=lucene.
Includes HTTP overhead and JSON serialization/deserialization.
Single shard, single replica configuration for optimal query performance.
Documents indexed with 'text' field (indexed, not stored) and 'id' field (stored, not indexed).
Caching is enabled as that is how we run Solr.
